short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An easier to use screen recorder extension.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This Chrome extension offers a simple solution to record content directly from your browser. With a single button, you can start and stop recording. The interface is minimalistic and easy to use, allowing you to manage your recordings intuitively. Recorded files are temporarily stored in the extension, and can be saved to your disk or automatically deleted when closing or refreshing the tab. In addition, it includes some customizable settings for a better user experience.
